name: Warma in dreams 沃玛和梦
name_original: Warma in dreams 沃玛和梦
description:
A simple fan game about Warma who is a Chinese Video Author. I plan to make it as a small game of puzzle and exploration, but development of this game was suspended due to academic issues and disputes with Warma itself.

Press ←→ to move

Press A to Interact with items

Press Z or X to leave or enter a new ground

The main language in the game is Chinese, but it comes with an English translation, and the development tool is SCRATCH 3.0, all game script, art-design and music are made by myself
